parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is passed by partner registration in merchant.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: This is a standard token obtained from the cart authentication API in merchant.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: The sign rule of the API request for each permission.

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: The identifier of the API request for each request

parameters.name: v
parameters.description: The first letter of the date at this article

parameters.name: tws_biz
parameters.description: The first part of the date at this article

parameters.name: cart_get_limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of gift which can be get

parameters.name: promotion_purchase_limit
parameters.description: Max. number of whole products that a promotion can purchase

parameters.name: cart_op_data_all
parameters.description: The id for cart at last

error_codes.description: There is no gift in store

notes: The documentation shows both common parameters and response parameters. There are also error codes listed at the bottom. The endpoint appears to be for cart operations with authentication and various limits.
